runs.comm: outside edge immediately. Very full outside off, some away shape. Overpitched though, more of an under edge to second slip.
shortish delivery outside off, too wide to induce a stroke and therefore Mithun chooses to let it be
best delivery of the day. Full outside off, some away movement. Driven with the shape to mid-off for a quick run. Direct hit at the strikers end. Good run that. Singles always important
lovely bowling this. Perfect length - fuller than a good length. A bit of movement helps take the outside edge of Sarkar down to third man.
big appeal, good appeal but impact was outside off. Full delivery, tailing back in late. The inward movement surprised Mithun who brings his bat down late. Pad-bat.
good change in length. Bangs this in short on middle, Mithun goes back and clips to fine leg. played that well

too straight to start and Mithun tickles it past short fine leg for four. On Mithun's pads and he had to just help it into the gap at backward square leg. Four pretty much off the bat, with this outfield.
better. Full, outside off. Lots of away swing. Mithun gets his foot close to the ball and leaves.
full and straight again, whipped off his pads towards deep square leg for a run.
extravagant shot. Good length outside off, appreciable swing. Mithun shimmies down and tries to hit through the off side, beaten
driven to cover. better feet movement, got close to the pitch and played under his eyes.
nice end. Fuller length on middle and off, Mithun tries to flick into the leg side but that away movement takes the outside half of the bat. Patted back up the pitch
awful start. Length on Sarkar's hips with short fine leg. Pulled past short fine leg. Easy runs. Poor delivery from Shahzad
better. Back of a length on off, moving away from Sarkar who opens the face to guide to third man
back of a length again outside off, Mithun flays the ball to third man. Off the outside edge really, didn't intend that to go there
tight lines. Good length on a fourth/fifth-stump line. An elegant square cut finds point
just short of gully. Full outside off, Sarkar tires to force it through the off side but again  a bit of movement takes the outside edge.
good comeback this from Shahzad. Bangs it in on a back of a length, Sarkar opens the face and guides it uppishly but wide of gully. Streaky stroke.
fullish on middle and leg, skewed off the inside half of the bat to fine leg
tight. Full on off, played down towards point. Wants one but is sent back by Sarkar

ooh, very close with a direct hit. Mithun struggling a touch here. Full delivery, tailing back into Mithun who squeezes it to gully off an inside edge. Gully races in and under-arms a throw but misses as Sarkar dives. out with a direct hit
good length outside off, there for the shot but Sarkar fails to connect with the attempted cut
muscled down the ground for four. Stand and deliver stuff. Full outside off, Sarkar doesn't move his feet but goes through with the straight drive. Past mid-off for four, good batting.
oh, beauty. Length on off, the ball shapes away late from Sarkar who is beaten.

dropped. Terrible stroke selection. Short outside off, some away movement. Mithun tries to drag the pull to midwicket but the ball lobs up off the outside half. Mid-off runs back but can only get a hand on it. An opportunity
fullish delivery outside off, Mithun strides forward to defend

again, an opportunity goes begging. Full delivery outside off, Sarkar steps down to smear it over midwicket. Takes the outside edge and flies in the air towards third man. Hung in the air for a year but the fielder cannot get there in time. Bounces just in front of his dive, Saqlain the fielder
whoa, dangerous stuff. Very high full toss on middle, Sarkar somehow gets bat on it to square leg
short delivery and dispatched with disdain. Mithun stays in his crease, clears one foot and thwacks the swat over mid-on. Big six. Will that get him going?
short outside off, thrashed into the gap at point for four. Runs leaking now. Not too wide but Mithun finds room to place his cut in the gap
full again outside off, played down defensively towards point.
that is a monster hit. Absolutely humongous. Length on middle, Sarkar gets the delivery he wants and muscles it over square leg. Went a long way back.
drifts down leg, wide. Keeper cannot collect either.

gone, Sarkar falls. Big wicket, against the run of play. Shahzad has the wicket. Full delivery outside off, too full maybe. Sarkar tries to go down the ground but cannot get under it enough. Hits it uppishly and straight into mid-on's lap
fullish delivery on off, off the outside edge to third man for a run
defended into the off side. Nice length that
length outside off, smeared into the leg side for a run. Not a good shot at all, lost his shape totally
length delivery on off, a bit of away shape. Off the outside half to third man for a run
tossed up on middle, Mithun comes down looking for a big hoick but squeezed towards midwicket and the batsmen scamper two.
flat down leg, off the pad towards short fine leg
flat on off, Sabbir gets low to paddle it fine towards fine leg
flat on middle, worked away to square leg with soft hands. Just the on this time
flat outside off, no turn. Defended
tossed up on off. Blocked defensively
fullish delivery on off, kept down towards point for a run
yikes. An ugly swipe. Full outside off, Sabbir goes for a heave down the ground but fails to connect.
steered down to third man off the open face
what a pick up shot that is. Magnificent to watch. Shimmies down and shuffles across, got a full delivery on middle and Mithun just flicks it in the air and deep into the stands.
four more. Poor line this. Full down leg, Mithun just flicked it fine for four. He had to just get bat on it and that he did. Mithun on the charge
good fielding by Mustafa. Full but wide and Mithun flays a cut to point who stops it nicely.
flat down leg, worked down to fine leg
short and wide, an under edge rolls to third man via the keeper's boot
flat outside off, Sabbir gets down low to play a hard sweep but misses. Off the body to third man
well bowled. Saw the batsman charging and dragged his length back, Mithun pushes to cover and wanders down the pitch before being sent back late.
clipped off his pads to square leg
fired in on leg, nudged to midwicket for one
full and fast outside off, drilled to long-off
pushed to long-on this time
and it has resulted in a wicket. Tossed up on middle and leg, Sabbir comes down and looks to heave it away. Doesn't get enough distance and the catch is taken on the midwicket fence.
whipped uppishly past midwicket, to deep midwicket
yorker outside off, Mithun misses
another yorker outside off but this time it is squeezed to deep point. Mithun wanted two but Mushy didn't. Sent back in time.
short and wide, should have been put away. Mithun misses
flat outside off, some spin too as Mithun flicks to fine leg for a run
short on off, pushed to point for a quick run.
driven away to deep cover for another single.
lovely bowling this. stifling the scoring. Flat on off, off the pad and then bat and then to cover
gets down low to sweep and misses. An optimistic appeal but that struck him outside the line of off
yorker on off, drilled to long-on. Just one
flat outside off, smashed back at the bowler
that will be four.l Too much width for Mithun who flays a cut to the deep point boundary. Good quality stroke.

gone, what was Mithun doing? Tossed up on off, Mithun tries to dab towards point for a quick run but gets an inside edge towards the keeper. He sets off aimlessly and the keeper whips off the bails. Run-out is Mithun, just when he was required to stick around.
tossed up outside off, driven into the gap to the sweeper cover
flat on middle, tickled to short fine leg
full delivery outside off, Rahim is beaten on the drive
shortish delivery on Rahim's hips. Looked like a run but Shakib says no

gone. Rahim is gone now. UAE storming back into the game. Short and wide, a ball tat should have been put away to the point boundary. Instead, he gets a thin feather through to the keeper and he has to walk back.
full outside off, Mahmudullah leaves
good length on off, defended under his eyes
full outside off, kept out. Wicket  maiden for Naveed.
pushed to cover
tossed up on middle, driven to long-on
flight on off, defended
flat on middle, tucked to midwicket. Pressure building with these dots
clipped to long-on
flat outside off, Shakib misses a cut. Just two of the over
crashed for six. Big hit. Important strike that. Length delivery on middle, Mahmudullah picks the length early and smashes it over midwicket. Great timing and a timely strike
length on off, kept down to point
kept a bit low. Good lines. Full on off, dabbed down to third man. Good batting from Mahmudullah
steered down to third man
good length outside off, worked with the open face to third man for a run.
full outside off, driven to cover.
some flight on off, defended back up the pitch. Too many dots
comes down the pitch to work to long-on
flat on off, pushed to long-on. These two intent on strike rotation for now
tickled towards midwicket. Just one again.
comes down the track and slogs the ball to long-on. Off the toe-end it seemed. A couple of runs
flat on middle, Shakib tries to heave it away but gets an edge - according to the umpire - towards third man for a brace
low full toss outside off, pushed down the ground to long-off. Another single
good yorker outside off, squeezed to point. Crucial dot ball.
very lucky runs but why will Shakib care? Yorker outside off, Shakib looks to cut but gets a thick inside edge which evades the keeper. Fortuitous
called a wide. Shakib premeditates the ramp and the bowler responds with a slow bouncer outside off
yorker on leg, driven to long-off. Good delivery, hitting that blockhole with regularity
superb shot. Overpitched outside off, drilled past cover. Long-off - Farhad - did not have much time to reach, moved across and put in a good diving save
wonder if Mustafa could have done better. Full on off, Mahmudullah hits it in the air to long-on where Mustafa runs in slowly and dives in front but the ball lands in front.
lovely yorker. Jammed out to cover for a run

very high full toss. Shakib is cleaned up. Misses his heave. Javed celebrates. The umpires want to check for a no ball. Looking for that yorker but misses it by some distance, Shakib surprised by the height misses it completely and a stump is uprooted. The front foot is fine and the height isn't checked. Looked under the waist anyway

two in two. Big, momentum-changing wickets these. Full delivery on off, Nurul looks to loft the ball down the ground but mis-times it, it skews up in the air off the inside half of the bat and carries to long-on, who takes a good catch, running in.
yorker outside off, low full toss in fact. Pushed away towards point
full on off, pushed to cover.
great finish. Great over. Yorker outside off, Mortaza misses.
crashed to the sweeper cover

another one goes. Apart from the blaring music, not much noise in this arena. Full again outside off, Mortaza drills a drive and it carries all the way to long-off who takes an excellent catch. That was flat
full delivery on off, pushed to cover
worked away to short fine leg for one.
another full delivery on off, driven to cover. Dot.
another full delivery, pushed to long-on. Great spell from Naveed. 2 for 12 from his four.
terrific batting. Picked his spot, knew that Mustafa will persist with those yorkers. He gets down low, gets a low full fast full toss and a fine paddle past fine leg earns them two
yorker on off, worked with soft hands towards deep midwicket. Two more
low full toss on middle, smeared to long-on. Another brace
running won't matter if he hits it like that. Full delivery, swiped away to deep midwicket. Big hit, six runs. Misses his length
low full toss, drilled away to long-off. Bounces in front, the throw is decent, but Mustafa cannot collect. Would have been out had he collected.

gone, run-out of the last ball. Bangladesh will get one. Driven to deep cover off the full delivery. The throw is good again, and this time Mustafa collects to run the batsman out and save his side a run
